item.title: System Specific
item.description: System Specific Web Servers must be configured according to a consistent image with the baseline configuration approved by Director of IT and Director of Marketing Multifactor authentication must always be used when accessing domain controllers Client systems must be validated periodically against a baseline image Etc created: 2021-12-14 20:43 modified: <%+ tp.file.last_modified_date() %>
